clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Characteristics and Risk Factors of Children Suffering From Inflammatory Bowel Diseases At Assiut University Children Hospital
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Characteristics and Risk Factors of Children Suffering From Inflammatory Bowel Diseases At Assiut University Children Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: Clinical Characteristics and Risk factors of Children Suffering from Inflammatory Bowel Diseases At Assiut University Children Hospital

detailed_description.textblock:
All patients admitted with inflammatory bowel disease will be subjected to:
1. History: including name, age ,sex ,family history, consanguinity, history of rectal bleeding, mucus or blood in the stool, diarrhea, abdominal pain ,vomiting ,nausea and loss of appetite.
2. Examination: including general examination, chest, cardiac, abdominal and neurological examination
3. Investigation:including labortatory such as fecal calprotectin ,CRP,CBC,ESR. Endoscopic examination of the gastrointestinal tract Histological examination of the biopsies retrieved during gastrointestinal endoscope.

primary_outcome.measure: Clinical characteristics and risk factors for IBD
primary_outcome.description: To study the natural history, patterns, and clinical characteristics (as history of real bleeding, mucus or blood in the stool, diarrhea, abdominal pain ,vomiting)and risk factors of inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD) at Assiut University Children Hospital

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Children aged less than 18 years with a confirmed diagnosis of IBD.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Children with colitis other than IBD or children with systemic diseases affecting GIT.
